enumMember.description: Version 97
Version 98
Version 99
Version 4
Version 5
Version 6
Version 7
Version 8

enumMember.name: v0-20
enumMember.description: Use GTP Prime version v0 with 20 bytes header

enumMember.name: v0-6
enumMember.description: Use GTP Prime version v0 with 6 bytes header

enumMember.name: v2
enumMember.description: Use GTP Prime version v2

enumMember.name: rating-group
enumMember.description: Report service data on rating-group level

enumMember.name: service-id
enumMember.description: Report service data on service-identifier level

enumMember.name: af11
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af12
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af32
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af33
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: af41
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af42
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af43
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: ef
enumMember.description: Expedited forwarding

enumMember.name: be
enumMember.description: Best effort forwarding

enumMember.name: af31
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af13
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: af21
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af22
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af23
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, high drop precedence

enum.name: ApnEncoding
enum.description: Method of ASN.1 encoding of the APN field in G-CDR

enumMember.name: dot-notation
enumMember.description: Encode dot as '.'

enumMember.name: digit-notation
enumMember.description: Encode dot as digit

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: RangedString64
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: MaximumAge
derivedDataType.description: Maximum age of charging log file

derivedDataType.name: MaxUriLength
derivedDataType.description: URI longer than this will be truncated

derivedDataType.name: N3Requests
derivedDataType.description: Total number of transmissions allowed for a control message

derivedDataType.name: RangedString21
derivedDataType.description: Must be a service identifier or a range of service identifiers

derivedDataType.name: CheckaliveInterval
derivedDataType.description: Seconds between sending checkalive messages to an unavailable CGF

derivedDataType.name: KeepaliveInterval
derivedDataType.description: Seconds between sending keepalive messages on an idle path

derivedDataType.name: MaximumSize
derivedDataType.description: Maximum size of charging log file

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

derivedDataType.name: TransactionTimeout
derivedDataType.description: Seconds a GTP response entry is stored

derivedDataType.name: Starts
derivedDataType.description: Must be a twenty-four hour local time given in 15-minute increments

attribute.name: chargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noInitialCdr
attribute.description: Suppress the initial charging record generation

attribute.name: use31bitsChargingId
attribute.description: Use 31 bits charging id instead of default 32 bits

attribute.name: noEmptyCdr
attribute.description: Do not close CDR at time limit if volume is zero

attribute.name: chargingFormat
attribute.description: Format of charging records

attribute.name: timeLimitMeasurementID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: ctxCreation
attribute.description: Time limits the CDR generation to prevent high cpu peaks when collecting CDRs

class.name: CdrAttribute
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noMsisdn satisfies (not(exists(@msisdnAlways)))'><name path='.'/>,noMsisdn: The following attributes can not be combined: no-msisdn, msisdn-always</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @msisdnAlways satisfies (not(exists(@noMsisdn)))'><name path='.'/>,msisdnAlways: The following attributes can not be combined: no-msisdn, msisdn-always</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noPdpAddressIpv4 satisfies (not(exists(../@chargingFormat)) or (not (../@chargingFormat eq 8)))'><name path='.'/>,noPdpAddressIpv4: No support for chargingFormat 8</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noPdpPdnAddressIpv4 satisfies (exists(../@chargingFormat) and (../@chargingFormat eq 8))'><name path='.'/>,noPdpPdnAddressIpv4: Only charging-format 8 is supported</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noPdpAddressIpv6 satisfies (not(exists(../@chargingFormat)) or (not (../@chargingFormat eq 8)))'><name path='.'/>,noPdpAddressIpv6: No support for chargingFormat 8</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noPdpPdnAddressIpv6 satisfies (exists(../@chargingFormat) and (../@chargingFormat eq 8))'><name path='.'/>,noPdpPdnAddressIpv6: Only charging-format 8 is supported</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noTrafficVolumes satisfies (not(exists(./TrafficVolumes)))'><name path='.'/>,noTrafficVolumes: The following attributes can not be combined: no-traffic-volumes, traffic-volumes</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceDataInMgmtExtension satisfies (exists(../@chargingFormat) and (../@chargingFormat eq 99))'><name path='.'/>,serviceDataInMgmtExtension: Only charging-format 99 is supported</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceDataInMgmtExtension satisfies (exists(@noNodeIdentifier))'><name path='.'/>,serviceDataInMgmtExtension: CDR attribute no-node-identifier must be configured for this feature</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceDataInMgmtExtension satisfies (exists(@noSgsnPlmnId))'><name path='.'/>,serviceDataInMgmtExtension: CDR attribute no-sgsn-plmn-id must be configured for this feature</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceDataInMgmtExtension satisfies (not(exists(@recordExtension)))'><name path='.'/>,serviceDataInMgmtExtension: record-extension is incompatible with this feature</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceDataInMgmtExtension satisfies (exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@adaptionOfRecordExtensions))'><name path='.'/>,serviceDataInMgmtExtension: Feature is licensed</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: cdrAttributeID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noReducedPartial
attribute.description: Generate fully qualified partial CDRs only

attribute.name: noNodeIdentifier
attribute.description: Don't include node identifier

attribute.name: noDynamicAddressFlag
attribute.description: Don't include indication if served PDP address is dynamic

attribute.name: noPdnConnectionId
attribute.description: Don't include pDNConnectionID

attribute.name: noServNodePlmnId
attribute.description: Don't include servingNodePLMNIdentifier

attribute.name: noTrafficVolumes
attribute.description: Don't include list of traffic data volumes

attribute.name: noApnSelectionMode
attribute.description: Don't include index indicating how the APN was selected

attribute.name: noCcSelectionMode
attribute.description: Don't include information about how charging characteristics were selected

attribute.name: recordExtension
attribute.description: Include record extension

attribute.name: noSgsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Don't include the SGSN PLMN identifier

attribute.name: noLocalRecordSequenceNumber
attribute.description: Don't include local record sequence number

attribute.name: noMsisdn
attribute.description: Don't include MSISDN

attribute.name: msisdnAlways
attribute.description: Always include MSISDN even if there is no change

attribute.name: noApnNetworkIdentifier
attribute.description: Don't include network identifier of APN

attribute.name: noPdpType
attribute.description: Don't include PDP type

attribute.name: noPdpPdnType
attribute.description: Don't include cdr attribute pdpPDNType

attribute.name: noPdpAddressIpv4
attribute.description: Don't include IPv4 PDP address

attribute.name: noPdpPdnAddressIpv4
attribute.description: Don't include IPv4 servedPDPPDNAddress

attribute.name: noPgwPlmnId
attribute.description: Don't include p-GWPLMNIdentifier

attribute.name: noStartTime
attribute.description: Don't include startTime

attribute.name: noStopTime
attribute.description: Don't include stopTime

attribute.name: noUserLocationInformation
attribute.description: Don't include user location information

attribute.name: noImsSignalingContext
attribute.description: Don't include IMS signaling context

attribute.name: noRatType
attribute.description: Don't include radio access technology (RAT) type

attribute.name: noImeiSv
attribute.description: Don't include IMEI and software version

attribute.name: serviceDataInMgmtExtension
attribute.description: Enable service data in management extensions

attribute.name: includeNewSgsnAddress
attribute.description: Enable inclusion of new SGSN address in CDR generated because of SGSN change

attribute.name: noMsTimeZone
attribute.description: Don't include ms time zone

attribute.name: apnEncoding
attribute.description: Method of ASN.1 encoding of the APN field in G-CDR

attribute.name: noThreegpp2Uli
attribute.description: Don't include 3GPP2 user location information

attribute.name: noPdpAddressIpv6
attribute.description: Don't include IPv6 PDP address

attribute.name: noPdpPdnAddressIpv6
attribute.description: Don't include IPv6 servedPDPPDNAddress

class.name: TrafficVolumes
class.description: Include list of traffic data volumes
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@noTrafficVolumes))'><name path='.'/>: The following attributes can not be combined: no-traffic-volumes, traffic-volumes</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: trafficVolumesID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: qosAlways
attribute.description: Always include QoS information even if there is no change

attribute.name: noUserLocationInformation
attribute.description: Don't include user location information

class.name: RecordExtensionAttributes
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(../@recordExtension)'><name path='.'/>: record-extension inclusion must be enabled</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: recordExtensionAttributesID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: userCategory
attribute.description: Include user category

attribute.name: bearerControl
attribute.description: Include bearer control

attribute.name: includeUriID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: count
attribute.description: Include URI event count

attribute.name: identifier
attribute.description: Include numerical URI identifier

attribute.name: volume
attribute.description: Include URI volume data

attribute.name: timestamp
attribute.description: Include URI event timestamp

attribute.name: maxUriLength
attribute.description: URI longer than this will be truncated

attribute.name: enhancedCdrID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noPsFurnishChargingInformation
attribute.description: Don't include PS furnish charging information

attribute.name: noTrafficVolume
attribute.description: Don't include traffic-volume

attribute.name: noServiceData
attribute.description: Don't include service data

attribute.name: serviceDataAttributesID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noRatType
attribute.description: Don't include radio access technology (RAT) type

attribute.name: noSgsnAddress
attribute.description: Don't include SGSN address

attribute.name: noSgsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Don't include SGSN PLMN ID

attribute.name: noServNodeAddress
attribute.description: Don't include serving node address

attribute.name: noQosInformation
attribute.description: Don't include QoS information

attribute.name: noUserLocationInformation
attribute.description: Don't include user location information

attribute.name: allowZero
attribute.description: Allow inclusion of service data with zero usage

attribute.name: reportingLevel
attribute.description: Level for service data reporting

class.name: RuleSpace
class.description: Setting for enhanced CDRs handling in rule-space
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='@ruleSpaceId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/RuleSpace/@ruleSpaceId'><name path='.'/>: Rule space must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: ruleSpaceId
attribute.description: Apply setting to rule space

attribute.name: serviceIdLevelReporting
attribute.description: Report on service identifier level

class.name: GtpPrime
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(../../Cpb/@gomAddressRange)'><name path='.'/>: cpb gom-address-range must be configured</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: gtpPrimeID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: keepaliveInterval
attribute.description: Seconds between sending keepalive messages on an idle path

attribute.name: t3ResponseTime
attribute.description: Seconds between control message retries

attribute.name: n3Requests
attribute.description: Total number of transmissions allowed for a control message

attribute.name: pathManagement
attribute.description: Use path management

attribute.name: diffserv
attribute.description: DiffServ DSCP for GTP packets

attribute.name: version
attribute.description: GTP Prime version

attribute.name: chargingFormat
attribute.description: Format of charging records

attribute.name: checkaliveInterval
attribute.description: Seconds between sending checkalive messages to an unavailable CGF

attribute.name: transactionTimeout
attribute.description: Seconds a GTP response entry is stored

class.name: DuplicatePrevention
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(../@version) and (../@version eq 2)'><name path='.'/>: GTP Prime version 2 must be enabled</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @instantRelease satisfies (exists(@partial))'><name path='.'/>,instantRelease: Duplicate prevention partial must be enabled</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: duplicatePreventionID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: partial
attribute.description: Use partial

attribute.name: instantRelease
attribute.description: Use instant-release

attribute.name: maximumSize
attribute.description: Maximum size of charging data file

attribute.name: maximumAge
attribute.description: Maximum age of charging data file

attribute.name: compression
attribute.description: Compress all CDR data files

attribute.name: cdrDataRate
attribute.description: Average CDR data transfer rate between GTPCD and FSAD

attribute.name: chargingDataFileID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: LocalDataFile
class.description: CDRs meant for normal offline transfer

attribute.name: localDataFileID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: forceEmptyFiles
attribute.description: Generate empty CDR data files if no CDRs are received

class.name: GtpPrimeDataFile
class.description: GTP Prime CDRs logged to disk on failure in reaching charging gateways

attribute.name: gtpPrimeDataFileID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: activateOnFailure
attribute.description: Store GTP Prime CDRs on disk if all charging gateways are down

class.name: TariffActivation
class.description: Local times when new tariffs apply

attribute.name: tariffActivationId
attribute.description: Tariff time index

attribute.name: starts
attribute.description: Local time that the new tariff is activated

class.name: ImsiBasedCharacteristics
class.description: Select charging characteristic based on IMSI

attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.description: Specify IMSI patterns using regular expressions
